actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide coverage under the Federal old age, survivors, and disability insurance system for all Members of Congress and other officers and employees in the legislative branch of the Government.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code to include all Members of Congress and other officers and employees in the Legislative branch of the Government under the Federal Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance system.

titles.title: A bill to provide coverage under the Federal old age, survivors, and disability insurance system for all Members of Congress and other officers and employees in the legislative branch of the Government.
